tool_description: Get useful statistics on every country in the world. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/country.
name: Country by API-Ninjas
title: Country by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/country

optional_parameters.name: min_area
optional_parameters.description: Minimum surface area of country in km2.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Plain English name, 2-letter ISO-3166 alpha-2, or 3-letter ISO-3166 alpha-3 code of country.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **5**.

optional_parameters.name: max_gdp
optional_parameters.description: Maximum gross domestic product (GDP) of country, in US Dollars.

optional_parameters.name: max_area
optional_parameters.description: Maximum surface area of country in km2.

optional_parameters.name: min_gdp
optional_parameters.description: Minimum gross domestic product (GDP) of country, in US Dollars.
